item.title: [c21] Vampire Nighthawk
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Shaman

Flying, deathtouch, lifelink

item.title: [c21] Taste of Death
item.description:
Sorcery

Each player sacrifices three creatures. You create three Food tokens. (They're artifacts with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

item.title: [c21] Suffer the Past
item.description:
Instant

Exile X target cards from target player's graveyard. For each card exiled this way, that player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

item.title: [c21] Silversmote Ghoul
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Vampire

At the beginning of your end step, if you gained 3 or more life this turn, return Silversmote Ghoul from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

{1}{B}, Sacrifice Silversmote Ghoul: Draw a card.

item.title: [c21] Gift of Paradise
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant land

When Gift of Paradise enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

Enchanted land has "{T}: Add two mana of any one color."

item.title: [c21] Cultivate
item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, and put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

item.title: [c21] Ageless Entity
item.description:
Creature — Elemental

Whenever you gain life, put that many +1/+1 counters on Ageless Entity.

item.title: [c21] Verdant Sun's Avatar
item.description:
Creature — Dinosaur Avatar

Whenever Verdant Sun's Avatar or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain life equal to that creature's toughness.

item.title: [c21] Rampant Growth
item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

item.title: [c21] Pulse of Murasa
item.description:
Instant

Return target creature or land card from a graveyard to its owner's hand. You gain 6 life.

item.title: [c21] Nissa's Renewal
item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library for up to three basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library. You gain 7 life.

item.title: [c21] Gaze of Granite
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy each nonland permanent with converted mana cost X or less.

item.title: [c21] Moldervine Reclamation
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever a creature you control dies, you gain 1 life and draw a card.

item.title: [c21] Leyline Prowler
item.description:
Creature — Nightmare Beast

Deathtouch, lifelink

{T}: Add one mana of any color.

item.title: [c21] Gluttonous Troll
item.description:
Creature — Troll

Trample

When Gluttonous Troll enters the battlefield, create a number of Food tokens equal to the number of opponents you have. (Food tokens are artifacts with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

{1}{G}, Sacrifice another nonland permanent: Gluttonous Troll gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

item.title: [c21] Sapling of Colfenor
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Treefolk Shaman

Indestructible

Whenever Sapling of Colfenor attacks, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, you gain life equal to that card's toughness, lose life equal to its power, then put it into your hand.

item.title: [c21] Alhammarret's Archive
item.description:
Legendary Artifact

If you would gain life, you gain twice that much life instead.

If you would draw a card except the first one you draw in each of your draw steps, draw two cards instead.

item.title: [c21] Paradise Plume
item.description:
Artifact

As Paradise Plume enters the battlefield, choose a color.

Whenever a player casts a spell of the chosen color, you may gain 1 life.

{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

item.title: [c21] Loxodon Warhammer
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +3/+0 and has trample and lifelink.

Equip {3}

item.title: [c21] Elixir of Immortality
item.description:
Artifact

{2}, {T}: You gain 5 life. Shuffle Elixir of Immortality and your graveyard into their owner's library.

item.title: [c21] Druidic Satchel
item.description:
Artifact

{2}, {T}: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token. If it's a land card, put that card onto the battlefield under your control. If it's a noncreature, nonland card, you gain 2 life.

item.title: [c21] Venser's Journal
item.description:
Artifact

You have no maximum hand size.

At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 1 life for each card in your hand.

item.title: [c21] Talisman of Resilience
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add {C}.

{T}: Add {B} or {G}. Talisman of Resilience deals 1 damage to you.

item.title: [c21] Sun Droplet
item.description:
Artifact

Whenever you're dealt damage, put that many charge counters on Sun Droplet.

At the beginning of each upkeep, you may remove a charge counter from Sun Droplet. If you do, you gain 1 life.

item.title: [c21] Pristine Talisman
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add {C}. You gain 1 life.

item.title: [c21] Well of Lost Dreams
item.description:
Artifact

Whenever you gain life, you may pay {X}, where X is less than or equal to the amount of life you gained. If you do, draw X cards.

item.title: [c21] Exotic Orchard
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.

item.title: [c21] Command Tower
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

item.title: [c21] Blighted Woodland
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{3}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Blighted Woodland: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

item.title: [c21] Golgari Rot Farm
item.description:
Land

Golgari Rot Farm enters the battlefield tapped.

When Golgari Rot Farm enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.

{T}: Add {B}{G}.

item.title: [c21] Gingerbread Cabin
item.description:
Land — Forest

({T}: Add {G}.)

Gingerbread Cabin enters the battlefield tapped unless you control three or more other Forests.

When Gingerbread Cabin enters the battlefield untapped, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

item.title: [c21] Forgotten Cave
item.description:
Land

Forgotten Cave enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {R}.

Cycling {R} ({R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

item.title: [c21] Lonely Sandbar
item.description:
Land

Lonely Sandbar enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {U}.

Cycling {U} ({U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

item.title: [c21] Llanowar Wastes
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{T}: Add {B} or {G}. Llanowar Wastes deals 1 damage to you.

item.title: [c21] Jungle Hollow
item.description:
Land

Jungle Hollow enters the battlefield tapped.

When Jungle Hollow enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.

{T}: Add {B} or {G}.

item.title: [c21] High Market
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{T}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain 1 life.

item.title: [c21] Rogue's Passage
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{4}, {T}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

item.title: [c21] Radiant Fountain
item.description:
Land

When Radiant Fountain enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.

{T}: Add {C}.

item.title: [c21] Opal Palace
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. If you spend this mana to cast your commander, it enters the battlefield with a number of additional +1/+1 counters on it equal to the number of times it's been cast from the command zone this game.

item.title: [c21] Myriad Landscape
item.description:
Land

Myriad Landscape enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {C}.

{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Myriad Landscape: Search your library for up to two basic land cards that share a land type, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

item.title: [c21] Temple of Malady
item.description:
Land

Temple of Malady enters the battlefield tapped.

When Temple of Malady enters the battlefield, scry 1.

{T}: Add {B} or {G}.

item.title: [c21] Tainted Wood
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{T}: Add {B} or {G}. Activate this ability only if you control a Swamp.

item.title: [c21] Secluded Steppe
item.description:
Land

Secluded Steppe enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {W}.

Cycling {W} ({W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

item.title: [c21] Sapseep Forest
item.description:
Land — Forest

({T}: Add {G}.)

Sapseep Forest enters the battlefield tapped.

{G}, {T}: You gain 1 life. Activate this ability only if you control two or more green permanents.

item.title: [c21] Temple of the False God
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}{C}. Activate this ability only if you control five or more lands.

item.title: [c21] Veyran, Voice of Duality
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Efreet Wizard

Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, Veyran, Voice of Duality gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

If you casting or copying an instant or sorcery spell causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.

item.title: [c21] Gyome, Master Chef
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Troll Warlock

Trample

At the beginning of your end step, create a number of Food tokens equal to the number of nontoken creatures you had enter the battlefield under your control this turn.

{1}, Sacrifice a Food: Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it.

item.title: [c21] Alibou, Ancient Witness
item.description:
Legendary Artifact Creature — Golem

Other artifact creatures you control have haste.

Whenever one or more artifact creatures you control attack, Alibou, Ancient Witness deals X damage to any target and you scry X, where X is the number of tapped artifacts you control.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ipS8qV-qiCU

item.title: [c21] Felisa, Fang of Silverquill
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Vampire Wizard

Flying

Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)

Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, if it had counters on it, create X tapped 2/1 white and black Inkling creature tokens with flying, where X is the number of counters it had on it.

item.title: [c21] Esix, Fractal Bloom
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Fractal

Flying

The first time you would create one or more tokens during each of your turns, you may instead choose a creature other than Esix, Fractal Bloom and create that many tokens that are copies of that creature.
